translations.home.title: Web Design Agency
translations.home.description: We create your unique, high-quality digital presence that combines strong brand identity with modern, efficient technology.
translations.home.brandDesc: Develop a compelling brand that resonates with your audience.
translations.home.webDesc: Build modern, responsive websites optimized for performance.
translations.home.strategyDesc: Strategies to attract and convert customers effectively.
translations.home.ctaTitle: Ready to Elevate Your Digital Presence?
translations.home.ctaDesc: Book a call today and let's discuss how Aurática can transform your online presence.
translations.about.title: About Aurática
translations.about.heroDesc: We craft unique digital experiences that elevate your brand.
translations.about.missionDesc1: At Aurática, we are passionate about creating unique, high-quality digital presences for companies. We combine strong brand identity with modern, efficient technology to help your business stand out in the digital world.
translations.about.missionDesc2: Our team of creative designers and skilled developers works closely with you to bring your vision to life, ensuring every project is tailored to your specific needs and goals.
translations.about.creativeDesc: Unique visuals that capture your brand's essence.
translations.about.clientDesc: Collaborative approach from concept to launch.
translations.projects.title: Our Projects Process
translations.projects.heroDesc: From idea to launch in just two weeks. We build strategic websites that drive results.
translations.projects.stage1Desc: Tell us about your business and we analyze it together to see if it's suitable for development. This free consultation helps us understand your goals and ensure we're the right fit.
translations.projects.stage2Desc: We implement the system, design, and launch your new strategic website in just two weeks. It's fully ready to generate customers with modern technology and compelling design.
translations.projects.stage3Desc: The website starts working for you, attracting, convincing, and converting visitors. We provide monthly visitor reports to track performance and ongoing support.
translations.process.title: Our Process
translations.process.desc: Discover how we bring your project to life step by step.
translations.contact.title: Contact Us
translations.contact.desc: Get in touch to discuss your project and start building your digital presence.
translations.contact.name: Name
translations.designs.title: Web Design Plans
translations.designs.description: Choose the type of website that best suits your business.
translations.services.process.title: Our Work Process
translations.services.stage1.title: Book a Call
translations.services.stage1.desc: In this initial stage, we schedule a call to get to know your business in depth. We analyze your needs and objectives to identify the key elements of your brand and establish the foundations of a successful project.
translations.services.stage2.title: Web Design and Development
translations.services.stage2.desc: We create your website with a modern and functional design, using the best development practices. We iterate continuously based on your feedback until you are completely satisfied with the final result.
translations.services.stage3.title: Digital Strategy
translations.services.stage3.desc: We implement an optimized SEO strategy to position your site in the top Google results. We improve the page's speed and usability, focusing on converting visitors into potential customers.
